explanation: [0-0] A sad frog sits with its head down in a clearing surrounded by green grass and flowers.

[0-7] A green frog sits in a clearing. Something green appears from the right side, and the frog turns its head in fear, standing up to look upwards. As the camera moves, a large green bear wearing swimming goggles can be seen. The bear takes out an old-fashioned camera with its right hand and swings it forward, walking past the frog to the left. The frog stares to the left with wide eyes and an open mouth.
